unnormalised: ## Mhojem WiFi punn ek pavtim gayab zala! (Ani Internetachea her tras)
normalised: Mhojem Wi-Fi portun A-W-O-L zalam! (Ani her Internetache tras)

unnormalised: Tor, hanv hanga asa, mhojea avddichea chai shopant bosun, digital dervish porim mhojea phonak zorboren vaprun. Kiteak, tum sodtat? Kiteak mhonnlear mhojem gharcha Wi-Fi-n an‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§ö‡§ø‡§§ sutti voir vochonk nirnnoy ghetla. Punn ek pavtim! Tem oxem asa, ek minttan hanv YouTube-acher bekti videos khuxalkayen pollouta (720p, svabhavik), dusrea minttan hanv tem bhayanok "Internet Connection Nathi" sandesh pollouta. Gambhirayen, ISP lokam, hem ek novo gunn asa? Hanv nischit asa mhojea xezarcheachem connection dhonddhak asa, sadhya BGMI kheltana sogllea bandwidth-ak harkhandun.
normalised: Tor, hanv hanga asan, mhoje avddichea chai dokanan bosun, eka digital dervish bhaxen utavllaien mhojea fonacher swiping kortam. Kiteak mhunn tum vichartat? Kiteak mhonnlear ghara voilem mhojem Wi-Fi ek anischit suttien gheunk nirnnoy ghettla. Portun! Eka minuteak hanv khuxalkaien YouTube-cher cat videos pollounk asan (sat xem ani vis p, sobayik), dusrea minuteak, hanv tea bhayanok ‚ÄúNo Internet Connection‚Äù sandexak polletam. Gombhirtayen, I-S-P lokam, hem atam ek feature asa? Mhojea xezareanchem connection rock solid asa mhunn mhojem tharav asa, sambhavit rupan B-G-M-I khellun soglli bandwidth hadapun.

unnormalised: Tumkam zannam asa, poilechea disanim, "offline" mhonnlear khorench bhair vochunk ani lokank ulo korunk. Atam, tem mhonnlear nirantor digital ekant, mhojea amanchem zolm dis visrunk poros ek vaitt fate (zo hanven kelo, 03/03-er, BTW. Maf kor, Amma!). Hanv koxen Instagram reels-ancher nirantor scroll koronk vo Twitter-ancher ajnani lokam sangata vad-vivaad koronk? Tem ek buniyadi monis hakka asa, nhe? Bhartiyea Samvidhanachem article 21-an nischit internet praptichi dhara mellonk zai, vo kamit-kamit sarakarachea utponn-saudik Jio dongle apatkalea khatir.
normalised: Tumkam khobor asa, adleach disamni, "offline" mhonnlear khoreponnan bhair vochunk ani lokamxim ulo marunk mhunn astalem. Atam, tachem orth nirdayee digital ekant, eka bhagint mummachea zolmache dis visrun ghevnchea porosui fattim asa (zo hanvem tisrea Marchak kelo, tea vatten. Maf kori, Amma!). Dusre vatten hanv Instagram reels-ancher nirantar scroll koxem korunk saktam vo Twitter-acher ajnani lokamxim vad koxem korunk saktam? Tem ek mulbhut moniskhi zai, kiteak na? Bharoti somvidhanachea article vis ani ekan garantid internet prapti vixim ek kalam samil korunk zai, vo kam-it-kom sarkari rupan subsidi zoddlelem Jio dongle avashyaktekhatir.

unnormalised: Ani buffering-acher mhoje ulo suru korunk dium naka! Tem oxem asa internet mhojem khilli kortale. Hanv eka video-cher click kortam zo, uloya, 3 minttacho asa, ani poilea 5 minttam loading wheel-ak giro dita pollonk. Mhojea rogtachem dab vhodd zata, mhoji chai thondd zata, ani mhojea viral famachem sopon dubllea internet dhonddhnachea kallkakancher vochonk poddta. Vichar kel'lem 100 Mbps? Chodd korun 10 Mbps boro disar, ani 2 Mbps jenna mhojem kutumb online asta. Ugh, #InternetStruggles khorench astat!
normalised: Ani buffering-acher start-uch kor naka! Tea bhaxen internet mhoje xiko dakoita. Hanv eka videoccher click kortam, zo tumi sangta, tin minute lamb asa, ani fattimchea panch minutamni loading wheel tachem mohaknrashit nritya polletam. Mojhem blood pressure udhan yeta, mhoji chai thondd zata, ani viral fame-ache sopnam sadharan internet speed-achie khodpacher zori zata. Vigyapan dil'li ek xem M-b-p-s? Eka borya disacher dhas M-b-p-s porosui odik, ani don M-b-p-s jevnnak moje kutumb online astata ten'na. Ugh, hash Internet Struggles khoreponnan asatat!

unnormalised: Uprant soglle password-anchem kathanok asa. Kiteak ami password dhorunk zai uloya, 12 akxaram sangata, 3 vhodd akxaram, ek hieroglyphic, ani eka rogtachem namuno fattim mhaka swata:che Wi-Fi-ak prapt korunk? Hanv nischit asa mhoje xezarche sopisticated hackers nhoi mhonn mhojem chorunk‚Ä¶ khorench, te mhojea Netflix hisabantlean fattim astele. Suchna ghetli. Tari punn, "P@sswOrd_Cr@zy!23" yad dovrunk ek mansik vyayam IIT pravesh porikshek yogy asa.
normalised: Ani tea uprant sogllea password-anchi kotha asa. Amkam passwordachi kashi zai padhrah akshram, tin vhoddlim akxaram, ek hieroglyphic, ani eka rogtachea namuneak amchem svota Wi-Fi prapti korunk koshish korun? Mhojem tharav asa ki moje xezari murkhas hacker nhoi mhoje‚Ä¶ barem, khorench, tankam moje Netflix account-achiek lagun dukhsunk zata. Vichar gheunk zata. Te astanam, "P at s-s-w-O-r-d underscore C-r at z-y exclamation mark two three" yad dourakhi ek manasik kasrat I-I-T entrance porikshek sobheta.

unnormalised: Ani sogllea tech jargon-acher kiteak asa? Mbps, GB, ping, router, modem, firewall‚Ä¶ tem ek puri novi bhas xiklea porim asa. Hanven mhojea tech-samarthyachea putnyak sangllem sogllek eksann sangonk, ani to TCP/IP protocols ani subnet masks-acher ek bhashonnant gelo. Mhoje dolle garam roti-cher lonnyachem poros zollod zavpak lagle. Mhaka fakt mhajea hasyachea bekti videos pollounk zai, soglea internet infrastrukturecheo bariksanv zannam asonk nhoi.
normalised: Ani sogllea tech jargon-acher kitem asa? M-b-p-s, G-B, ping, router, modem, firewall‚Ä¶ek navin bhas xikunk porim asa. Hanvem mhojea tech-savvy putnyak sanglo he sogllem ekdom explain korunk, ani to T-C-P slash I-P protocols ani subnet mask-ancher ek lecture diunk laglo. Mhoje dolle ek unnea butter-acher udhan geye. Mhaka fokot maje funny cat videos polleunk zai, sogllea internet infrastructure-ache sankirnnataya samzunk zai.

unnormalised: Imandaren, kenna-kenna mhaka dista mhojem smartphone Arabian Samudrant uddonk ani Keralantlea eka durust gamvant ravonk cholonk, zo ekmatr sambondh nisarga kodden asta. Punn magir mhaka yad yeta hanv online biryani order korunk visrtelam (‚Çπ250 Behrouz kadun, BTW) ani mhojea ixttank WhatsApp-acher hasyachea memes daddunk. Tor, mhaka lagta hanv hea internetachea pritiche-dveshachea sambondhanant asonk poddta, buffering ani sogllem.
normalised: Satyan, keden tori mhojem chintop mhaka dista mhoje smartphone Arabian sea-nt uddovunk ani Kerala-che ek durachem ganvan vochunk, zantunt eka ekta sambandh nisarg-k asa. Punn magir mhaka yad yeta ki hanv biryani online order korunk (rupee don xem ani panch Behrouz-achea vaten, tea vatten) ani majhea dostank WhatsApp-acher mazache memes dhaddunk visrun vetolm. Tor, mhunn hanvem chintun ghetlam hanv he love-hate sambandh internetachea sangata, buffering-achem ani sogllea sangata, atkunk asan.

unnormalised: Kaim vochpak zata. Mhoji chai thondd zata, ani hanven Wi-Fi signal-echo zolok dekhlo. Kadachit, te ek chinh asa mhojem internet nirnay ghetla jivat aschea bhumint porot yenk. Mhaka subhechha di! Ani tumchea internet xezarcheanchea poros vegim zata mhonn di. Amen. Atam dekhpak hanv ek pan bhorunk shakto vo nhoi tem signal porot gayab zancho porian... ü§û
normalised: Kiteak tori, vochunk zai. Mhoji chai thondd zata, ani hanvem Wi-Fi signalachi jhalak dekhli. Sambhavit rupan, fokot sambhavit rupan, ti ek nishanni asa ki moje internet shevottak jivant ashil'lea zageant portun melunk nirnnoy ghettla. Mhaka subhechha diunk zai! Ani tumchem internet tumchea xezarchea porosui sodanch vegan asunk di. Amen. Atam dekhtam ki hanv ek webpage load korunk shakteam ki na to signal portun pira geye adim... crossed fingers
